page.title: 09A.1
page.content: not a motorway and any traffic can use it.There is also a bus shelter next to the {Bridge Inn.}Buses use this road to travel South.There is a speed limit it is 70 miles an hour.One of the bus services which uses this road runs through{Hunsingore.}It links York with Wetherby.There are only 3 buses daily. The other roads in the area lead to Cattal and Whixley.The roads in {Ribston Park}are all private roads. There are some footpaths and minor roads which link the farms.There is also a footbridge across the river{ {Nidd }to Cowthorpe.The road through {Hunsingore}is used as a short cut to the{A.1.}by people from the{North East to avoid going through York. There is a single track railway which links York with Leeds.There is a train about once an hour most weekdays.At peak times these are very busy.
